mapper.insert: insert into css.necessary_selections (courseId, stuId, selectionCoins, teacherId, state) values (#{courseId}, #{stuId}, #{selectionCoins}, #{teacherId}, #{state})
mapper.delete: delete from css.necessary_selections where courseId=#{courseId} and stuId=#{stuId}
mapper.update: update css.necessary_selections set state=#{newState} where state=#{oldState}
